question: Which Indian state/UT is to set up the country's first Electric Vehicle park?
explanation:
The state of Tamil Nadu is to set up a park exclusively for the electric vehicle manufacturing eco-system. This will be the countryâ€™s first such park.
The state is also targeting investments for around Rs 50000 crore and employment for over 1.5 lakh people in the EV sector. Tamil Nadu had announced a detailed EV policy last year with incentives and subsidies for manufacture and purchase. The state has signed MoUs with several companies in this regard.
